tool_description: Evaluates fire department access, egress routes, and emergency response capabilities for the property.

street_width_feet.description: Width of street providing primary access

driveway_access.description: Presence of driveway or direct building access

hydrant_distance_feet.description: Distance to nearest fire hydrant in feet

exit_doors_count.description: Number of exit doors from building

exit_door_widths.description: Width of each exit door in inches

elevator_count.description: Number of elevators with firefighter service

error_messages: Street width error: Width must be between 8 and 100 feet.
Hydrant distance error: Distance must be between 0 and 2000 feet.
Exit door count error: Must have at least 1 exit door.
Door width error: Each door width must be between 20 and 120 inches.
Exit count mismatch: Number of exit_door_widths must equal exit_doors_count.
Stairwell count error: Cannot exceed 10 stairwells.
Elevator count error: Cannot exceed 20 elevators.
usage: Provide street_width_feet, driveway_access, fire_lane_compliance, hydrant_distance_feet, exit_doors_count, and exit_door_widths. Include stairwell_count and elevator_count for multi-story buildings.
